rationale: Explores the high correlation of 'net_dimension' around 1340 and slightly increases 'lr_schedule_factor' to potentially improve training stability.
Explores the high correlation of 'norm_stocks_exp' around -7 and slightly increases 'time_decay_floor' to potentially stabilize the model's focus on stock normalization.
Explores the high correlation of 'volatility_penalty' around 0.03 and slightly decreases 'max_drawdown_penalty' to potentially reduce the model's sensitivity to drawdowns.
